content: this quick and easy crochet dishcloth pattern is sure to be your new favorite this easy crochet dishcloth pattern will be available instantly after purchase you will love the texture on this crochet dishcloth it s fun to crochet and makes a nice absorbent dishcloth for your kitchen materials needed - worsted weight cotton yarn - crochet hook size h 8/5 0 mm - tapestry needle for weaving in ends the pdf pattern includes photos and instructions for making the textured dishcloth finished dimensions of the dishcloth is approximately 9 square pattern is written in english using standard american terms level beginner ***please note that this easy crochet dishcloth pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
